price: Belki de sen, bu kitaba iman etmiyorlar diye onların arkasından üzüntüden kendini helak edeceksin.
arabic: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ إِن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falaʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka ʿalā āthārihim in lam yu'minū bihādhā al-ḥadīthi asafan
